g++-4.8   -Wall -std=c++11 -pthread -fpermissive -fno-rtti -O2 -g -Wall -std=c++11 -D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0 -pthread -fpermissive -fno-rtti -O0 -g   CMakeFiles/lbfs.dir/main.cpp.o  -o /home/zm/XMSrc/bin/lbfs  -L/home/zm/XMSrc/src/../lib -rdynamic cmake/lib/libcom.a cmake/lib/libcab.a cmake/lib/libcell.a cmake/lib/libchannel.a cmake/lib/libpins.a cmake/lib/libdcir.a cmake/lib/libutility.a cmake/lib/libsqlite.a cmake/lib/libcom.a cmake/lib/libcab.a cmake/lib/libcell.a cmake/lib/libchannel.a cmake/lib/libpins.a cmake/lib/libdcir.a cmake/lib/libutility.a cmake/lib/libsqlite.a -lpthread -ljson -lzmq -lsnap7 -lxml2 -lmodbus -ldl -Wl,-rpath,../lib
